metadata.title: Our Brands - Aforevo, MBI Music & Tech
metadata.description: Explore the Murphy Ben International ecosystem. From Aforevo's dominance in Nollywood streaming to MBI Music's global Afrobeatz distribution.

hero.heading: Powering the Future of African Entertainment
hero.subheading: Our portfolio of brands connects millions of creators and consumers daily across video, audio, and technology.

brands.name: Aforevo
brands.tagline: The Global Stage for African Cinema
brands.description: Aforevo is one of Africa's largest YouTube Multi-Channel Networks (MCN) and content aggregators. We specialize in the acquisition, localization (dubbing), and distribution of premium Nollywood movies to a global audience.

brands.name: MBI Music
brands.description: A comprehensive digital music distribution service helping African artists reach global platforms like Spotify, Apple Music, and Boomplay. We provide rights management, monetization, and playlist pitching.

brands.name: MBI Tech
brands.description: The backbone of our operation. MBI Tech builds proprietary tools for piracy protection, content ID management, and automated royalty splitting for our partners.
